Articles.Content:
I was wandering in the Internet at one of my favorites sites here in Mexico called 'Chilango.com' (chilango is a word that named us, all the people born in Mexico City, used by those who born outside it), which publishes news of all topics and for all audiences, and I found that they posted one video of how Earth is seen from Space Station

Here is the link:

http://www.chilango.com/observadorchilango/la-tierra-vista-desde-la-estacion-espacial

The view is amazing! When the video reaches 00:20 seconds, the Space Station is already over Mexico and you can see Mexico City's lights at 00:27.

Sorry it is in Spanish.

Cheers.

the earth is so beautiful. i wish i was on this space station

PS. i been seeing this video a lot on the forum.
